name: yiisoft/yii2-queue
description: Yii2 Queue Extension which supported DB, Redis, RabbitMQ, Beanstalk, Gearman, Kafka, AWS SQS, STOMP, Filesystem

suggest.enqueue/amqp-ext: Required for support of AMQP with queue interop
suggest.enqueue/amqp-lib: Required for support of AMQP with queue interop
suggest.enqueue/amqp-bunny: Required for support of AMQP with queue interop
suggest.enqueue/amqp-tools: Required for support of message delay with AMQP
suggest.enqueue/rdkafka: Required for support of Kafka with queue interop
suggest.enqueue/sqs: Required for support of AWS SQS with queue interop
suggest.enqueue/dbal: Required for support of Doctrine Dbal queue with queue interop
suggest.enqueue/redis: Required for support of Redis queue with queue interop
suggest.enqueue/fs: Required for support of filesystem queue with queue interop
suggest.enqueue/gearman: Required for support of Gearman queue with queue interop
suggest.enqueue/pheanstalk: Required for support of Beanstalk queue with queue interop
suggest.enqueue/stomp: Required for support of STOMP with queue interop
